title: MESMERISMUS® bring out the power of the unconscious mind with non- verbal hypnosis / Dr. Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret unveils more about Mesmerismus® and the results he got with non-verbal hypnosis. And we will see an incredible hypnotic induction from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass, where he teaches the most powerful techniques such as Fascination - the power of the gaze, and Mesmerism, from the ancient times. His students experience deep hypnotic states and learn to become professional or to achieve personal development. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
